description:
The game is a Ludum Dare 37 compo entry (made under 48 hours)

Here are my results :

#34 Innovation (4.05)

#49 Graphics (4.12)

#61 Overall (3.88)

#67 Audio (3.68)

#85 Humor (3.49)

#87 Mood (3.71)

#194 Fun (3.43)

#362 Theme (3.46) (lol)

If the game keeps loading, you should try to press space everywhere on the screen.
